meaningMnemonic: If you look inside a <radical>samurai</radical>'s <radical>heart</radical>, you'll discover their true <kanji>intention</kanji>s and <kanji>ambition</kanji>s.
readingMnemonic: You try to read the <kanji>intention</kanji>s of the samurai in front of you and they're dark, evil, scary. Oh no! These are the intentions of the <reading>shee</reading>p (し) samurai!
